Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.resolve

[Groovy] Class DependencyManagerConfigurer

    • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.resolve.DependencyManagerConfigurer

    • Configures the Ivy dependency manager for usage within Grails

      Authors:
      Graeme Rocher
      Since:
      2.3
